lines.text: [Sitting at the dinner table]
Excuse me. May I go to the bathroom first?
Of course you may.

[after a pause, and with relief]
Thank you.

[telling a phony story to sucker Janet into giving him money]
I was engaged to a girl back in the States. And we loved to dance... we wanted to be professionals, isn't that silly? And we got an opportunity to compete on television, on Dance USA. So we agreed that if we won, we'd get married. So we went on, and we danced, and we won!
That's great!
And in the excitement, we got separated. So I went back to the studio, and there they were. Naked, dancing... and then they stopped, and they made love right there on the dance floor!

[gasps]
Who was she with?
Denny Terrio, the host of Dance USA.
I didn't steal any money! She just saw me with another woman! You're French, you understand that!
To be with another woman, that is French. To be caught, that is American.
Fellas, last year I made 3 million dollars, but your 50 thousand was the most fun. Are you ready? Then let's go get 'em.
Do you ever have a single thought that originates from above the waist?
No!
know your limitations. You are a moron.
May I take your trident, sir?

I know somebody here! I met him on a train! His name... is... his name is... James. No. His name is... James Josephson. Lor. No, no, no. James Lawrence. LAWRENCE... Lawrence. Lawrence Fells. Lawrence Feings. Forest Lorenston. Low. Lars. LARS. Lawrence. Lawrence. Luch. Lawrence. Tuh. His name is James Jesenthon. Lawrence Fell. Lawrence Jesterton. LAWRENCE JESTERTON.
...Lawrence Jamieson?

[to a 'wheelchair-bound' Freddie, as Lawrence tries to goad him into getting up and dancing... two sailors are watching and one calls out to Freddie]
Oy! Oy mate! Who's the asshole!

[joining in]
Get up and dance, he says! I'd like to smack him one!
I've got culture coming out of my ass.
A poacher who shoots at rabbits may scare big game away.

[after watching Lawrence continue to goad Freddie]
Why that piece of shit!
[calls out to Freddie]
Oy! There's a plane leaving at one o'clock for Honduras. How'd you like your friend to be on it?
[Freddie nods gratefully]

[in a childlike voice]
Oh, Lawrence! This is the happiest day of my life! I think my testicles are dropping!
[Ruprecht is mauling Lawrence's new girlfriend]
Ruprecht, do you want the genital cuff?
Not mother?

[omitted from the profit distribution]
Excuse me. What about me? What do I get?
You are the student. You get knowledge.

[greeting a returning Freddy]
Welcome to Hell.
You've been banging on your pots again, haven't you? I've told you... if you keep on doing it, you won't have any pots left
